body.name: Easyfone T300 4G LTE Unlocked Senior Flip Cell Phone, Big Button Clear Sound Flip Mobile Phone for Elderly with SOS Button, GPS and Big Charging Dock (Red)
body.stockDetail: Only 13 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 33 mins
features: Classic flip design, Flip to answer calls; Big button with talking numbers feature for easy dialing, Clear sound for easy hearing and with Simple OS easy to use.
2.4" HD Main Display + 1.44" External colorful HD screen, Both screen big font & big icon for easy viewing.
1500mAh Real capacity battery, Long time standby with an easy cradle charger, Just place the phone on its stand, and it starts charging!
Powerful speaker with clear sound for easy hearing and HAC Compatible for user with hearing aid device.
Additional SOS button with GPS positioning, 8 Photo Speed Dial Buttons(8 number keys can be set); 3 dedicated shortcut button (Block Button & Alarm Clock & Photo Speed Dial).
Multi useful functions like GPS positioning/Flashlight/FM Radio/Camera/Photo Speed dial/Tasks/Audio player/Bluetooth/Alarm/Calculator/Calendarand and etc.
Package included a SpeedTalk SIM Card which running on T-Mobile network, Variety of plans starting at $5 a month, Option for Port-in(Keep) your exising phone number or Get a New phone number.
This Phone Not compatible with AT&T, Cricket or with CDMA Networks like Verizon, Sprint, and Boost Mobile.
body.description: Feature ▶Speed Dial Buttons 2-9 are designated for speed dial contacts. Calling is easy with a simple press and hold of the button. ▶EMERGENCY SOS BUTTON You can set 8 SOS call numbers. In an emergency, press the SOS button for 3 seconds to dial emergency numbers and send SMS to get immediate help from your family or friends ▶Charging Dock Special design charging cradle for seniors, simply put the phone in and charge the phone, easy to charge, care for seniors. ▶HEARING AID COMPATIBLE With M4/T4 hearing aid compatibility, you can be sure the call quality is free of interference and easy to hear. Specifications: Color: Black/Red/Blue SIM: Single SIM Screen: 1.44 inch IPS HD display + 2.4 inch IPS HD display Flash: 128+64MB Battery: 1500mAh Camera: 0.3MP MP3/MP4: Support Wireless FM: Support Bluetooth: Support Flashlight/Torch: Support Side button: Volume adjust button, Unlocked slide button, Torch slide button Languages: English, French, German, Italian, spanish, etc. Package Contains: 1 x T300 Senior Mobile Phone 1 x 1500mAh Battery 1 x Charger 1 x USB Cable 1 x Charging Dock (Black) 1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars $5 a month makes this the lowest cost cell phone plan available
reviews.reviewText: I was without Landline & DSL for 4 days after a drunk driver collided with a tree and caused a fire that melted the phone lines. My sister insisted that I buy a cell phone as a backup. I bought an additional memory card, too. Use the ... button to access menu items on the bottom left, and the arrow button to access menu items on the bottom right. The Easyfone uses the T-Mobile 4G network.I bought the Easyfone July 2023. The battery failed in December. After a series of emails with Easyfone support, I was mailed a new battery at no cost. I did not have to ship back the old battery, either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Zero Stars! Horrible Quality
reviews.reviewText: This phone never was able to charge from the cradle. I had to charge directly, and it took many hours. The phone lost its charge without even being used. Again, taking hours to recharge.At one point I was able to use the phone, but calls were dropped. The features were wonky and would not always allow me to perform certain functions. ie: create a contact or speed dial. This took up a lot of time and caused frustration.So my summary is this - I am a technically savvy individual and it was difficult and sometimes impossible for me to set up and use this phone, causing major frustrations. This is being advertised as a phone suited for seniors? Well, this was never able to make it to my mom's hands in which it was intended. She does not need anything super techy or savvy like an iphone, but she certainly needs something that is dependable when she needs it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I work with individuals with developmental disabilities and was helping a 70 year old client get set up with a free phone service. However, to use that service they would send out a SIM card to place in a phone. It is difficult to find an unlocked flip phone that will accommodate this type of SIM card. What I loved from the description is that they had an IMEI number so I could use that to go back to the website for the phone service and confirm it was compatible. I assisted my client in purchasing this through my prime account (as she didn't have one) and once received I set it up for her. It was super easy to set up and she learned to use it very quickly. I like the charging stand which allows her to charge it easily which she couldn't do with a standard plug in charge. I also love the lanard that it comes with as now we can have her ride medical transport services independently and ensure her phone doesn't get lost. All in all this phone has been fabulous and I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good flip phone for non-photographers.
reviews.reviewText: Other flip phones with 2 megapixel cameras cost half as much. If you are looking for a flip phone without need of a camera this one is for you. The other features of this phone make it quite attractive. Emergency one button calling and a simple layout among them. Since my Aunt will want to be able to take pictures, she is an artist, I returned it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Is there a warranty on it? I can't seem to be able to contact the seller. for the past 6 month I keep having problems with the phone. Now I can't even call out. On it's own it stops working I have to turn it off and on to get it to work again. Can I replace or return it?Hannah

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not for my Mom
reviews.reviewText: It is difficult for a 83 year old to make a phone call. This phone is not simple for seniors who has no technology knowledge.I had to return it.

reviews.reviewText: Old phones and can’t get activated . Pay to much for this phone
